bibl.title: Five tax receipts from Djeme in the collection of Columbia University
bibl.note: Edition of five Coptic tax receipts (Djeme, 717-725 CE). All receipts are for the poll tax (diagraphon) and are written by the same scribe, Psate son of Pisrael. - 1. O. Col. Inv. 82. 12 July 725. - 2. Inv. 109. 26 June 724. - 3. Inv. 795. 21 April 721. - 4. Inv. 950. 7 October 717. - 5. Inv. 1102. 721/722. - P. 155: Appendix: Summary of the Receipt's Key Details (in chronological order).
bibl.seg: Jennifer Cromwell, Five Tax Receipts from Djeme in the Collection of Columbia University.

Edition of five Coptic tax receipts (Djeme, 717-725 CE). All receipts are for the poll tax (diagraphon) and are written by the same scribe, Psate son of Pisrael. - 1. O. Col. Inv. 82. 12 July 725. - 2. Inv. 109. 26 June 724. - 3. Inv. 795. 21 April 721. - 4. Inv. 950. 7 October 717. - 5. Inv. 1102. 721/722. - P. 155: Appendix: Summary of the Receipt's Key Details (in chronological order).
